SELECT lk.id as lawTaskId , lk.law_task_code as lawTaskCode , lk.execute_person as executePerson , lk.patrol_object as patrolObject , lk.start_time as startTime, lk.end_time as endTime, lk.state as state, lk.law_title as lawTitle FROM law_task as lk LEFT JOIN law_execute_person as lep ON lk.id = lep.law_task_id LEFT JOIN law_patrol_object as lpo ON lk.id = lpo.law_task_id WHERE lk.is_deleted=0
AND lep.user_name LIKE "%"#{userName}"%"
AND lpo.regula_object_name LIKE "%"#{regulaObjectName}"%"
AND lk.state = #{state}
AND ( #{startTime} <= lk.crt_time AND lk.crt_time <= #{endTime} )
GROUP BY lk.id, lk.law_task_code, lk.execute_person, lk.patrol_object, lk.start_time, lk.end_time, lk.state

SELECT id , law_title lawTitle, start_time startTime, end_time endTime FROM law_task WHERE is_deleted = 0
AND state = #{state} AND execute_person LIKE #{user} ORDER BY crt_time DESC, upd_time DESC
